title: Song - in comparing himself to the sun

content.prompt: In comparing himself to the Sun in the second stanza, the speaker makes all the following points EXCEPT:

choices.label: The Sun returns, and so will he.
The Sun is slower paced than he will be.
The Sun has a shorter distance to travel than he does.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
